mapper.select: insert into comment(content, comment_user_id, comment_board_id) values (#{content}, #{uId}, #{bId}); update board set commentCount = commentCount+1 where board_id= ${bId};
select count(*) from comment where comment_board_id = ${bId};
select comment_id from comment where comment_board_id = ${bId} and comment_id = ${cId};
